full_summary:
## Solicitation for Services
### Tender Number
rfx002090

### Category
Computer Services (81110000)
	
### Supplier Solicitation
Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites submissions for a Security Consultant for the TBIPS contract stream. The Consultant will provide strategic IT security planning and protection services for a maximum period of three years.

### Key Details

* **Contract Term**: Three years, commencing with a one-year base term, with two additional one-year extension options.
* **Contract Service**: Stream 6 Cyber Protection Services, C.1 Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant.
* **Contract Level**: Senior Level, 1 position available.
* **Intermediate Level**: 2 positions available for options to add.

### Subcontracting Details
This solicitation is being sent to the following Value Added Resellers (VARs) and Service Resellers (SRs):
- 7792395 Canada Inc.
- Accenture Inc.
- ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
- ALTRUISTIC INFORMATICS CONSULTING INC.
- Calian Ltd.
- Ernst & Young LLP
- IBM Canada Limited/IBM Canada Limitée
- KPMG LLP
- MNP LLP
- Modis Canada Inc
- Onaki Création S.E.N.C., in Joint Venture with IBISKA TELECOM INC.
- Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
- Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc
- The Bell Telephone Company of Canada or Bell Canada/La Compagnie de Téléphone Bell du Canada or Bell Canada
- The Herjavec Group

### Requirements
The selected Consultant will be required to develop a corporate-wide cyber strategy that outlines how CMHC's cyber-related investments will be used across the enterprise to achieve business success. The strategy must explicitly link to business outcomes, rather than internal activities.

### Closing Date
Appel d'offres closed: April 26, 2023

### Additional Contact Information

* Contact: Christine Brown
* Contact Email: [ccbrown@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:cbrown@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)
* Contact Telephone: (613) 748-2534

### Reference Documents
The complete solicitation package is available for download at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4629/rfx002090-tbips-bid-solicitation---security-consultant-april-5-2023.pdf](https
